frame.name: FR_Cognizer_affecting
frame.definition:
<def-root>Super frame to encompass cases in which a <fen>Cognizer</fen> acquires a new stance, by either coming to believe some <fen>True_content</fen> is true, or that some <fen>Legitimate_content</fen> is legitimate, or that he should perform some <fen>Action</fen>. This happens either because of some <fen>Evidence</fen>, or because of a <fen>Persuader</fen> who causes, through language or otherwise, the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to have a new stance.
<ex></ex> <asf>Distinctions with other frames</asf>: <ex></ex>
â‰ <frframe>FR_Attempt_suasion</frframe>: In FR_Cognizer_affecting the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has actually changed their mind. <ex></ex> <asf>Relation to fndata-1.5</asf> : Results from the merge of Suasion and Eventive_cognizer_affecting, and the splitting into .to_do, .veracity and .legitimacy, based on whether the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is convinced to perform an action or that some content is true or legitimate.</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>The person whose mind the <fen>Persuader</fen> seeks to change.</def-root>

FE.name: Persuader
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who intends through the use of language or otherwise to get another person to change their mind.</def-root>

FE.name: True_content
FE.definition: <def-root>The content that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> accepts as true as a result of the <fen>Evidence</fen>, or of the <fen>Persuader</fen>'s words.</def-root>

FE.name: Legitimate_content
FE.definition: <def-root>The content that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> accepts as legitimate as a result of the <fen>Evidence</fen>, or of the <fen>Persuader</fen>'s words.</def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition: <def-root>The action that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> resolves to perform as a result of the <fen>Evidence</fen>, or of the <fen>Persuader</fen>'s words.</def-root>

FE.name: Medium
FE.definition: <def-root>A piece of written or spoken material that changes the stance of the <fen>Cognizer</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Evidence
FE.definition: <def-root>The Evidence is a state of affairs which motivates the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to change their mind. </def-root>
